metadata.description:
To celebrate its recent Green Apple award, publisher Eco Comics has released this FREE comic book which showcases a number of its PAPERLESS-EXCLUSIVE titles.

Storytelling talent includes rising stars JL Czerniawski, Chris Bunting, and John-Paul Howard. 

Also on the roster: popular 'Dandy"' and 'Beano' artist, Steve Beckett... and Marvel art legend and Wolverine co-creator, Herb Trimpe!
metadata.name: Eco Comics - Free Paperless Preview Comic
